# It appears there was no output from the query for the recipes of the Burner Mining Drill and Stone Furnace. This suggests that I may not have access to the crafting recipes in the current environment.

# Given the situation, I need to take a step back and ensure that I have the necessary starting resources or items to begin crafting. 
# Since the environment seems to be empty, I might need to check if there are any commands available to spawn resources or items directly.

# I will look for any commands or functions that allow me to add items to my inventory manually.
# Let's check the available commands for inventory manipulation.
available_commands = list(global.actions.keys())
available_commands
